definition: having or revealing keen insight and good judgment
details:
adjective
- having or revealing keen insight and good judgment
= example: having or revealing keen insight and good judgment
- able to make or detect effects of great subtlety
- quick to understand
= synonyms: apprehensive
- unobtrusively perceptive and sympathetic
= example: unobtrusively perceptive and sympathetic
= synonyms: discreet
